title: Name of shot teen released
content:
Toledo police on Friday released the name of a teenager shot in central Toledo on Thursday afternoon.
Investigators determined Andrew Graeter, 16, of Toledo was shot in both feet about 2 p.m. Thursday in the 1700 block of Tecumseh Street.
He was treated at ProMedica Toledo Hospital, police said. A hospital spokesman said no further information was available.
Young Graeter went to a nearby food store, G&M Food Mart at 526 N. Detroit Ave., to report he had been shot.
Police said he later gave conflicting accounts of what had happened.
